Test Name: Isochromosome 12p FISH for Germ Cell Tumor (Tissue)
Purpose: To detect the presence of isochromosome 12p in germ cell tumors using fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH).
Container: Microscope slide prepared from FFPE tissue block
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope with appropriate filters; ThermoBrite (or equivalent) hybridization chamber; water bath/hybridization oven
